name: Sports New Media
overview:
Sports New Media is a media and technology company that works with sports athletes, agents, clubs, brands, governing bodies and associations to maximise their potential within Facebook.

Sports New Media is a key partner with Facebook in the UK and USA. We have also recently been made a Microsoft BizSpark One Partner which give is a one-2-one relationship with Microsoft in the UK and USA.

Sports New Media is the only company to have formed of joint venture with The Professional Footballers’ Association (PFA) in its 100 year history. The PFA is regarded at the oldest, richest and most powerful sports association in the world.

Sports New Media has built, manages, publishes to and moderates a network of 800 professional football player Facebook pages for The PFA (The Professional Footballers’ Association).

This network started lest than a year ago with a handful of pages and a few thousand fans, the network now has over 20m fans, from over 120 countries, growing by more than 2 fans a second (over 1m fans a week).

The PFA Fan Pages are 300%+ larger than the entire NBA presence on Facebook.
